name: Warm Tuna Buns
author: ralloyd
summary: Wonderful tuna melt type sandwich that is a big hit with kids, teens and adults. Freezes great.
ingredients: ¼ cup shredded processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®)
directions: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with water
Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes
Remove eggs from hot water, cool under cold running water
Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Stir the chopped eggs together with tuna, mayonnaise, processed cheese, relish, onion, and olives in a mixing bowl
Divide the tuna mixture among the bun bottoms, then replace the bun tops
Wrap each sandwich individually in aluminum foil and place onto a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese has melted and the tuna salad has heated through, 10 to 15 minutes
